depression.title: Depression
depression.definition: Depression is a mood disorder characterized by persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest
depression.symptoms: Depression symptoms include feeling sad, loss of energy, sleep disturbances, and difficulty concentrating
depression.treatment: Depression can be treated with therapy, medication, or a combination of both

anxiety.title: Anxiety
anxiety.definition: Anxiety is a normal response to stress but can become a disorder when excessive
anxiety.symptoms: Anxiety symptoms include excessive worry, restlessness, and physical symptoms like rapid heartbeat
anxiety.treatment: Anxiety can be treated with therapy, relaxation techniques, and medication

burnout.title: Burnout
burnout.definition: Burnout is a state of emotional, mental, and physical exhaustion caused by prolonged stress
burnout.symptoms: Burnout symptoms include chronic fatigue, cynicism, and feelings of ineffectiveness
burnout.prevention: Burnout can be prevented with stress management, adequate rest, and social support

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This tool is for educational and screening purposes only. It does not replace professional evaluation. If you are in crisis, contact emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.professional_help: Always consult with a mental health professional for proper diagnosis and treatment.
disclaimer.privacy: All data is processed locally on your device. We do not store or transmit your personal information.
